page.title: 05Cheshunt childrens leisure
page.content: Cycling is the most popular outdoor activity.Block home and bulldog are favourite running games.Rounders and Swedish longball are enjoyed.They like play acting. Swimming and football are the most popular clubs. Many do music, largely recorders, piano and violin. Others go dancing. One child writes : I enjoy swimming for my club in galas, with style judges walking at the side ready to disqualify you if you do something wrong. Lego is a popular toy, monopoly and draughts are favourite games. Half the children like action figures. A large number use computers. Some enjoy chess. Most children watch T.V. often for 2_3 hours at a time. Comedy programmes are their favourite.They listen to Radio 1 most. Beano is the most popular comic.3 out of 10 read newspapers.
